about_the_game:
SuperPosition is sokoban style classic puzzle game with a twist.

Quantum superposition

The fundamental concept of superposition in physics is where particles exist in multiple states simultaneously until observed, forms the foundation of each challenge you encounter. Your objective is to navigate through a level and set up all boxes on targets and then go to exit. If you ecounter a quantum object You must deal with it all posible states at once.

As you progress through the game, you'll face numerous obstacles that utilize quantum properties. These include walls, spikes, quantum teleports, interdimensional swiches, and more. Mastering the art of manipulating these quantum phenomena will be crucial to achieve goal.

Key Features

  • Solve 90 increasingly complex puzzles that test your understanding of quantum physics and require innovative problem-solving strategies,

  • Numerous amount of obstacles creating unique challenge combinations,

  • Collect stars for completing the level with additional challenges,

  • Show your creativity with built-in level editor,

  • Share custom levels with Your friends via Steam Workshop,

  • Play on multiple platforms with Steam Cloud save.

Will you take up the challenge?

SuperPosition offers a unique mind-expanding gameplay. Challenge your intellect, think with quantum entanglements and prove your skills!

Will you be able to achieve a SuperPosition?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel i5-4440
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 610
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: SuperPosition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4440
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 610
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Sokoban style quantum puzzle game. Make your way through many variations of one level at once using one sequence of moves!
